title: (Visual) Corki E bug
body: Whenever I play or someone plays a Corki, when they use E little purple circles start appearing on Corki. It's everytime Corki uses E.

replies.body:
Hey glittered32,

This is a known issue and we're working on a fix. Thanks for the report! :]
could be your league files, i have not seen this

Around when this patch came out, I had a glitch that kept happening where when a Poppy would E+Q a bunch of blue particles would blow up everywhere, doesn't happen anymore but when it did it was a hilarious, also having this problem
